description.value: When you drink this potion, you gain the "reduce" effect of the Enlarge/Reduce|XPHB spell for 1d4 hours (no Concentration|XPHB required). The red in the potion's liquid continuously contracts to a tiny bead and then expands to color the clear liquid around it. Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.

_srdData.name: Potion of Diminution
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the "reduce" effect of the {@spell Enlarge/Reduce|XPHB} spell for {@dice 1d4} hours (no {@status Concentration|XPHB} required).
The red in the potion's liquid continuously contracts to a tiny bead and then expands to color the clear liquid around it. Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.
